subject: The Class Loader fix
msgSnippet: I m surprised... Everyone was yelling about the big class loader defect in JUnit, but no-one wants to talk to me about it! Someone here has a fix, so lay it on
messageBody:
I'm surprised...

Everyone was yelling about the big class loader defect in JUnit, but
no-one wants to talk to me about it! Someone here has a fix, so lay it
on me!

Thanks.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
